string.text: Text that will display when the achievement is gained and when the player lists their achievements. Placeholders: {viewer} for the viewers name, and {name} for the name of the achievement.
Gold awarded for gaining this achievement.
Experience awarded for gaining this achievement.
Whether to give a custom item as reward (defined below)
Specifications of the custom item reward, if enabled
Requirement uses current class, useful for class power unlocks so you don't have to specify the class explicitly
Class required to get this achievement. If (none) is specified then the achievement will apply ONLY when the hero doesn't have a class set.
The statistic this achievement relates to.
Whether hero needs more or less than the specifed Value. For instance you can make requirements for the hero to have less than 10 deaths and more than 100 kills.
Value needed to obtain the achievement.
Other statistic to compare against (this overrides Value if specified).
Whether this class is enabled for use in the game or not
Name of the class that shall be passed to SetHeroClass actions
Description of the class (used in documentation)
Which formation to add summoned units to
Item type to put in slot 1
Item type to put in slot 2
Item type to put in slot 3
Item type to put in slot 4
Whether to allow horse (can be combined with Use Camel)
Whether to allow camel (can be combined with Use Horse
Passive hero power: this will always apply to the hero (i.e. a permanent buff)
Active hero power: this power will be triggered only when the UseHeroPower action is used by the viewer, via reward or command (i.e. a temporary buff)
Text that displays when the kill streak is achieved. Placeholders: {viewer} for the viewers name, and {name} for the Kill Streak name, and {kills} for the Kills Required.
Kills required to achieve the kill streak.
Gold rewarded when the kill streak is achieved.
Experience granted when the kill streak is achieved.
The min level it should be (actual value will be randomly selected between min and max, valid values are 0 to 1023)
The max level it should be (actual value will be randomly selected between min and max, valid values are 0 to 1023)
Gives gold to the adopted hero
How much gold to give the adopted hero
Allows viewer to 'adopt' a hero in game -- the hero name will change to the viewers name, and they can control it with further commands
Create a new hero instead of adopting an existing one (they will be a wanderer at a random tavern)
Allow noble heroes (if CreateNew is false)
Allow wanderer heroes (if CreateNew is false)
Allow companions (not tested, if CreateNew is false)
Only allow heroes from same faction as player
What fraction of assets will be inherited when a new character is adopted after an old one died (0 to 1)
How many custom items can be inherited
Only viewers who have been subscribers for at least this many months can adopt, ignored if not specified
Gold the adopted hero will start with
Random range of age when overriding it
Starting skills, if empty then default skills of the adopted hero will be left in tact
Equipment tier the adopted hero will start with, if you don't specify then they get the heroes existing equipment
{Inheritance}% of gold spent on equipment and retinue
You have already adopted a hero!
You must be subscribed for at least {MinSubscribedMonths} months to adopt a hero with this command!
You must be subscribed to adopt a hero with this command!
No hero is available: player is not in a faction (disable Player Faction Only, or join a faction)!
You can't adopt a hero: no available hero matching the requirements was found!
{OldName} is now known as {NewName}, they have {NewGold} (inheriting {Inherited})!
{OldName} is now known as {NewName}, they have {NewGold}!
If set a random attribute is improved, otherwise the viewer should provide part of the name of the attribute to improve (this works best as a chat command)
Provide the attribute name (or part of it) when calling this
Couldn't improve any attributes, they are all at max level!
Provide the attribute name to improve (or part of it)
You have gained {Amount} points in {Attribute}, you now have {NewAmount}!
You have gained a point in {Attribute}, you now have {NewAmount}!
Couldn't improve {Attribute} attribute, it is already at max level!
Allows viewers to auction custom items, for other viewers to bid on (make sure to add a bid command also)
How long the auction should last before the highest bidder wins
Interval at which to output a reminder of the auction
Another auction is already in progress
You have no items to auction
{ItemCount} items found matching '{ItemName}', be more specific
Auction of '{ItemName}' is OPEN! Reserve price is {ReservePrice}{GoldIcon}, bidding closes in {AuctionDurationInSeconds} seconds.
Allows viewers bid on an active custom item auction (make sure to add an auction command also)
Allow improvement of adopted heroes who are also companions of the player.
Whether to re-equip the equipment INSTEAD of upgrading it (you should make TWO commands, one to upgrade and one to reequip)
Re-rolls your equipment at your current tier
You are a player companion, you cannot change your own equipment!
You cannot upgrade equipment, as a mission is active!
Add focus points to heroes skills
What skill to add focus to
Chooses a random skill to add focus to, prefering class skills, then skills for current equipment, then other skills. Skills setting is ignored when auto is used.
Automatic, based on class, equipment, and existing skills
Couldn't find a valid skill to add focus points to!
You have gained {Amount} focus points in {Skill}, you now have {NewAmount}!
You have gained a focus point in {Skill}, you now have {NewAmount}!
Allows viewers to discard one of their own custom items
You have no items to discard
{Count} items found matching '{Args}', be more specific
Allows viewers to give one of their own custom items to another viewer
You have no items to give
Will write various hero stats to chat
Show personal info: health, location, age
Shows skills (and focuse values) above the specified MinSkillToShow value
If ShowTopSkills is specified, this defines what skills are shown
Shows the equipment tier of the hero
Shows the full battle inventory of the hero
Shows the heroes storage (all their custom items)
Shows the full civilian inventory of the hero
Shows a summary of the retinue of the hero (count and tier)
Shows the exact classes and counts of the retinue of the hero
Shows all hero tracked stats (kills, deaths, summons, attacks, tournament wins etc.)
Lower bound of amount to improve
Upper bound of amount to improve
Gold that will be taken from the hero
Puts adopted heroes in queue for the next tournament
Allow viewer to name custom items
Add and improve adopted heroes retinue
Whether this action should attempt to buy/upgrade as many times as possible when called with no parameter.
You cannot upgrade retinue, as a mission is active!
Retires the hero, allowing the viewer to adopt another (if that is enabled)
You must enter '{Prompt}' at the prompt to retire your hero
You cannot retire your hero, as a mission is active!
Allows changing the 'class' of an adopted hero, which affects the equipment and where XP is applied
If this is free when the hero does not have a class already (this can only happen if Adopt does NOT specify a default class)
Gold cost for Tier 1 class change
Gold cost for Tier 2 class change
Gold cost for Tier 3 class change
Gold cost for Tier 4 class change
Gold cost for Tier 5 class change
Gold cost for Tier 6 class change
Whether to immediately update equipment after changing class
Free if you do not already have a class
Updates equipment to match new class
You cannot change class, as a mission is active!
Chooses a random skill to add XP to, prefering class skills, then skills for current equipment, then other skills. Skills setting is ignored when auto is used.
Automatic, based on class, equipment, and existing skills
Couldn't find a skill to improve
Spawns the adopted hero into the current active mission
Can summon for normal field battles between parties
Can summon in the hideout missions
Whether the hero is on the player or enemy side
Which formation to add summoned heroes to (only applies to ones without a specified class)
Multiplier applied to (positive) effects for subscribers
HP the hero gets every second they are alive in the mission
You cannot be summoned now, this mission does not allow it!
You cannot be summoned now, the mission has not started yet!
You cannot be summoned now, the mission is ending!
You cannot be summoned, you are already here!
You cannot be summoned now, the mission has not started yet!
You cannot switch sides, you traitor!
You cannot be summoned, you DIED!
You cannot be summoned, you are already here!
You cannot be summoned, your party is already here!
Could not find a party for you to join!
Text that will be displayed in game
Higher weight means more chance this shout is used
Can be used when summoning on player side
Can be used when summoning on enemy side
Can be used in situations other than battle/siege
Can be used when in a field battle
Can be used when on siege defender side
Can be used when on siege attacker side
Allows activation of the adopted heroes class active powers
You don't have a class, so no powers are available!
You cannot activate your powers now: {FailReason}!
Compensated @{HeroName} with {GoldAmount}{GoldSymbol} for {CustomItemsCount} invalid custom items
@{HeroName} is no longer a prisoner of {PartyName}!
Dead or retired hero {OldName} renamed to {HeroName}
You can't bid on your own item
Bid of {Bid}{GoldIcon} does not meet reserve price of {ReservePrice}{GoldIcon}
You already bid more ({Bid}{GoldIcon}), you can only raise your bid
You cannot cover a bid of {Bid}{GoldIcon}, you only have {BidderGold}{GoldIcon}
{Time} seconds left in auction of '{ItemName}', high bid is {HighestBid}{GoldIcon} (@{HighestBidderName})
{Time} seconds left in auction of '{ItemName}', no bids placed
Auction for {ItemName} is FINISHED! The item will remain with @{ItemOwnerName}, as no bid met the reserve price of {ReservePrice}{GoldIcon}.
Auction for {ItemName} is CANCELLED! @{ItemOwnerName} retired or died.
Auction for {ItemName} is CANCELLED! @{ItemOwnerName} is no longer in possession of the item.
Auction for {ItemName} is FINISHED! The item will go to @{HighestBidderName} for {HighestBid}{GoldIcon}.
Maximum number of units in the retinue. Recommend less than 20, summons to NOT obey the games unit limits.
Whether to use the adopted hero's culture (if not enabled then a random one is used)
Whether to allow bandit units when UseHeroesCultureUnits is disabled
No valid troop types could be found, please check out settings
Betting is now OPEN for round {RoundIndex} match: {Teams}!
Betting is now OPEN for final match: {Teams}!
Betting is only allowed on the final
Team name must be one of {Teams}
You can only bet on one team
Betting is now CLOSED: only one team bet on, bets refunded
Betting is now CLOSED: no bets placed
You are already in the tournament queue!
You are position {QueuePosition} in the tournament queue!
Multiplier applied to all rewards for subscribers (less or equal to 1 means no boost). NOTE: This is only partially implemented, it works for bot commands only currently.
The specification for custom item rewards, applies to tournament prize and achievement rewards
Whether the hero will always start with full health
Amount to multiply normal starting health by, to give heroes better staying power vs others
Amount to multiply normal retinue starting health by, to give retinue better staying power vs others
Reduces morale loss when summoned heroes die
Whether an adopted heroes retinue should spawn in the same formation as the hero (otherwise they will go into default formations)
Minimum time between summons for a specific hero

How much to multiply the cooldown by each time summon is used. e.g. if Summon Cooldown is 20 seconds, and UseMultiplier is 1.1 (the default), then the first summon has a cooldown of 20 seconds, and the next 24 seconds, the 10th 52 seconds, and the 20th 135 seconds. See https://www.desmos.com/calculator/muej1o5eg5 for a visualization of this.
Shows the consecutive cooldowns (in seconds) for 10 summons
Whether an adopted hero is allowed to die
Final death chance percent (includes vanilla chance)
Apply Death Chance To All Heroes
Whether to apply the Death Chance changes to all heroes, not just adopted ones
Use raw XP values instead of adjusting by focus and attributes, also ignoring skill cap. This avoids characters getting stuck when focus and attributes are not well distributed.
Skill cap when using Raw XP. Skills will not go above this value. 330 is the vanilla XP skill cap.
Gold the hero gets for every kill
XP the hero gets for every kill
XP the hero gets for being killed
HP the hero gets for every kill
Gold the hero gets for every kill their retinue gets
HP the hero's retinue gets for every kill

How much to scale the kill rewards by, based on relative level of the two characters. If this is 0 (or not set) then the rewards are always as specified, if this is higher than 0 then the rewards increase if the killed unit is higher level than the hero, and decrease if it is lower. At a value of 0.5 (recommended) at level difference of 10 would give about 2.5 times the normal rewards for gold, xp and health.
Caps the maximum multiplier for the level difference, defaults to 5 if not specified
Gold won if the heroes side wins
XP the hero gets if the heroes side wins
Gold lost if the heroes side loses
XP the hero gets if the heroes side loses
Apply difficulty scaling to players side
Apply difficulty scaling to enemy side
End reward difficulty scaling: determines the extent to which higher difficulty battles increase the above rewards (0 to 1)
Whether to use the popup banner to announce kill streaks. Will only print in the overlay instead if disabled.
Sound to play when killstreak popup is disabled.
The level at which the rewards normalize and start to reduce (if relative level scaling is enabled).
Whether powers are disabled in a tournament
Amount to multiply normal starting health by
Heroes won't get any kill rewards in tournaments
Tournament kills / deaths won't be counted towards achievements or kill streaks
Remove horses completely from the BLT tournaments (the horse AI is terrible)
Replaces all lances and spears with swords, because lance and spear combat is terrible
Replaces all armor with fixed tier armor, based on Culture if possible (tier specified by Normalized Armor Tier below)
Armor tier to set all contestants to (1 to 6), if Normalize Armor is enabled
Randomizes the weapons used in each round, weighted based on the classes of the participants
Applies skill debuffs to previous tournament winners
Gold won if the hero wins thier match in the round
XP given if the hero wins thier match in the round
XP given if the hero loses thier match in a round
Gold won if the hero wins the tournaments
XP given if the hero wins the tournaments
XP given if the hero participates in a tournament but doesn't win
Only allow betting on the final betting
Skill or skill group to modifer (all skills in a group will be modified)
Reduction to the skill per win (in %). See https://www.desmos.com/calculator/ajydvitcer for visualization of how skill will be modified.
The lower limit (in %) that the skill(s) can be reduced to.
Shows the % reduction of the skill over 20 tournaments
The name of the power: how the power will be described in messages
The various effects in the power. These can also have customized unlock requirements, so you can have classes that get stronger (or weaker!) over time (or by any other measure).
Particles/sound effects to play when this power group is activated
Particles/sound effects to play when this power group is deactivated
Duration the power will last for (when used as an active power), in seconds
Effects to apply to the agent while the power is active
Name of the power that will be shown in game
